Buy Olaplex Professional Hair Perfector No3

Olaplex No 3 is now available at Luxe Concept Salon, Chatswood.  Don’t live in Sydney? No problem – we are happy to arrange postage to anywhere in Australia.  You can either purchase Olaplex via our online shop – or call us to discuss the best product and arrange delivery.

Olaplex In-Salon Treatment

Now available at Luxe, Olaplex is a revolutionary new chemistry that multiplies bonds and crosslinks broken bonds.  Created by two of the worlds leading chemists to make hair stronger whilst colouring, Olaplex allows us to go Blonder, Bolder and leave hair stronger than ever before. It may sound mumbo jumbo, but worlds top colourists love Olaplex, and as they say, the proof is in the pudding!

How do we push the envelope further without compromising the integrity of the hair and the fear of damaged hair? Olaplex Bond multiplier No1 is added to the lightener or colour. Olaplex Bond perfector No2 is then applied after colour rinsing to dramatically reduce breakage with the colour service. To optimize Olaplex, clients can take home the professional Hair Perfector No3 which strengthens the hair further and has amazing additional benefits such softer, shinier, stronger hair that is easier to manage from the first use.
